title: Creational Patterns
description: The creational patterns aim to separate a system from how its objects are created, composed, and represented.They increase the system's flexibility in terms of the what, who, how, and when of object creation.

title: Structural Patterns
description: Structural design patterns are design patterns that simplify the design by identifying a simple way to realize relationships among entities

title: Behavioral Patterns
description: behavioral design patterns are design patterns that identify common communication patterns among objects. By doing so, these patterns increase flexibility in carrying out communication
